propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Input sObject Type
propertyType.description: Select the object the component will use

property.name: inputSObjectsList
property.label: Input sObject collection
property.description: Collection storing the data you want to display in the component for the user to select from (displayed on the left)

property.name: selectedSObjectsList
property.label: Selected sObjects collection
property.description: Collection storing the data the user has selected (displayed on the right side)

property.name: listCount
property.label: Input List Count
property.description: This is the count of items in the input sObject collection (number of records in the left table)

property.name: selectedListCount
property.label: Selected List Count
property.description: This is the count of selected items (number of records in the right table)

property.name: inputTableFieldNames
property.label: Input (Left) Table's Field Names
property.description: Collection of strings to specify the fields (API names) for left table

property.name: selectedTableFieldNames
property.label: Selected (Right) Table's Field Names
property.description: Collection of strings to specify the fields (API names) for right table
